summary_gpt: The company announced changes to its Key Managerial Personnel (KMP) contact details, effective from May 1, 2025, including the appointment of Mr. Kedar Vaze as Whole-Time Director and CEO, Mr. Rohit Saraogi as CFO, and Ms. Deepti Chandratre as Legal Counsel & Company Secretary. The updates were approved by the Board and are now publicly disclosed on the company's website and filed with stock exchanges.

Keva announced the resignation of Mr. Rohit Saraogi as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer, effective April 30, 2025, and appointed Ms. Deepti Chandratre to the same position from May 1, 2025, with additional responsibilities as Global Legal Counsel. The changes were approved by the Board of Directors during their meeting held on April 30, 2025.

The changes were approved by the Board of Directors during their meeting held on April 30, 2025.
